snippet.title: Horizons: The End Of Words 🌌 Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Horizons is a wordgame set in outer space. The grid is infinite, but your oxygen is not. Make words to explore the galaxy, find resources, complete challenges, meet aliens, and discover new planets.

🚀 Get the game on Itch: https://punkcake.itch.io/horizons
🪐 Get the game on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3230280/Horizons_The_End_Of_Words/
🌠 Get the game on Patreon: https://patreon.com/punkcake
👽 Make contact with us on Discord: https://discord.gg/TkdktuKBgp
